snippet: Men are also attacked, but their bodies aren’t the target.
abstract: Op-Ed article by editor Amy Wallace condemns gender-specific attacks on female journalists, particularly those that target journalists' sexuality or physical appearance, rather than fairness and accuracy of their work; maintains men are not subject to such attacks, and that phenomenon contributes to unequal gender representation in journalism.
lead_paragraph: Men are also attacked, but their bodies aren’t the target.

headline.main: Life as a Female Journalist: Hot or Not?
headline.print_headline: Life as a Female Journalist: Hot or Not?
